summary: You can summon 38 Mounts (25 Dovahbits) wherever you want + you can find 12 companions in Ivarstead + you can easily DISMISS when you want with a Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Rabbit.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size="7"] Bunnies Mounts and Followers[/size][/b] by gg77[/color] [color=#00ff00]version 5.4

Optional File: Esp version Française pour la Version 5.4[/color]

..... [i]30,000 th mod of the Nexus ![/i]

"Bunnies" allow you to summon 38 Bunnies (25 Dovahbits) Mounts and -simple- Followers wherever you want.

You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Rabbit"

You can find 12 Companions in Ivarstead/Fort-Ivar.

The Wild Rabbits are around Ivarstead


No DLC required !

To access in Vvardenfell (Morrowind) and Cyrodiil (Oblivion) with these mounts you have the 2 mods WIP: [url=http://morroblivion.com/]SKYWIND and SKYBLIVION [/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Vz15Aup.gif[/img]

[i]Thousands of years ago, the great forest of Falkreath were ruled by the Hare tribe and their mighty king, Bunny. This was an era of peace and prosperity. Rabbits from everywhere traveled the long distances to come under the protection of the king and his Fluffy Guards. But this was no meant to last.... An ancient god brough the scourge of the rabbit on the kingdom, the wolves.... The Hares fought bravely, but were driven off their kingdom, heading south, vowing to one day return....

The time has now come. The appearance of the dragonborn is the sign the Hares were waiting for! King Bunny XI the Warrior comes forth to claim his rightful kingdom !

[/i]...[i]a story by [color=#ff0000]FireFangs[/color][/i]...

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=491431dovahbit2.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/491431dovahbit2.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]INSTALLATION (very important)[/color]

[color=#ff8c00][i]Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1)[size="7"][color=#ff0000] You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "[/color][/size]

[color=#ff8c00][i]For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

2) [color=#ff0000]You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to obtain the 39 books...(Normally, this is done automatically !)[/color]

3) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)

4) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):


[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001


These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not


You can find the 38 “Spell tome: Summon Bunny XXXX” and the “Spell tome: Dismiss Summoned Rabbit" at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=144444Follower7.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/144444Follower7.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]Bugs or Problems[/color]

1) The Rabbits can’t jump or swim…

If you dismount in the water with the Rabbits, it is possible to swim in the air !! Solution: MOUNT AGAIN or SPACEBAR

To turn easily,it is better to walk ! ...

If you have any problem with these mounts, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...

2) You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have "lost" the “active” Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

3) With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=740942dovahbit3.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/740942dovahbit3.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]Credits[/color]

Thanks to [color=#ff0000]Chocolambot[/color] Mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4033#content ]HD Bunnies Rabbits with Different Shades [/url]for the beautiful textures of the six Bunnies (“Asset use permission”:“ You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me”)

Thanks to[color=#ff0000] Mickyan[/color] with his Mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37982//?]Dovahbit of Caerbannog [/url]for the meshes (helmets) of its Dovahbits (Bunnies with helmets)

Thanks to [color=#ff0000]KANRAx2[/color] and [color=#ff0000]DRAGONPORN[/color] with the Mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38138/?]yurufuwa rabbit [/url]("Modders resources and tutorials") for the meshes and the textures of the rabbits (and the rabbit medal)

New (free) sounds for the followers

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]PiLvlWw9q2w[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

files.name: Bunnies - Mounts and Followers 5.4
files.changelogHtml:
version 5.4: New sounds for the followers + the followers "at rest" can now to move

version 5.3.1: reduced size for the followers and the wild rabbits + correction of a bug when the wild rabbits are running

version 5.3: You can easily DISMISS when you want with an other "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Rabbits"
